action.action-desc: Mr. Buchanan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to restore the 10-year statute of limitations applicable to collection of debt by administrative offset.

section.text: This Act may be cited as The Stop Punishing Innocent Taxpayers Act.

subsection.text: Section 3716(e) of title 31, United States Code, is amended to read as follows:

paragraph.text: to a claim under this subchapter that has been outstanding for more than 10 years; or
when a statute explicitly prohibits using administrative offset or setoff to collect the claim or type of claim involved.

subsection.text: In the administration of section 3716(e) of title 31, United States Code, the following provisions of law shall be treated as if they had never been enacted:

paragraph.text: Section 14219 of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 (Public Law 110–234; 122 Stat. 1483), repealed as duplicative enactment by section 4 of Public Law 110–246 (7 U.S.C. 8701 note).
Section 14219 of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 (Public Law 110–246; 122 Stat. 2245).
